item.title: Mentioned by The Vancouver Observer
item.description:
Parliament debates NDP motion to defeat FIPA
The NDP, whose MP Don Davies tabled the motion, opposes FIPA in its current form. They, and many others, say that it is harmful to the environment and indigenous groups, and is anti-democratic. Davies' motion is meant to inform the Chinese government ...
